mapper.select: SELECT V.IDX, V.TITLE, V.VOLUNTEER_DATE, V.TIME, V.LOCATION, V.CAPACITY, V.APPLICANTS, V.AGE_TARGET, V.CREATED_AT, VT.NAME AS VOLUNTEERTYPE, VS.NAME AS VOLUNTEERSTATUS FROM VOLUNTEERS V JOIN VOLUNTEER_TYPES VT ON V.VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX = VT.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_STATUS VS ON V.VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX = VS.IDX WHERE V.USER_IDX = #{userIdx} ORDER BY V.CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOLUNTEERS ( USER_IDX, VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX, VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX, TITLE, VOLUNTEER_DATE, TIME, LOCATION, CAPACITY, APPLICANTS, CONTENT, AGE_TARGET ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{volunteerTypeIdx}, #{volunteerStatusIdx}, #{title}, #{volunteerDate}, #{time}, #{location}, #{capacity}, 0, #{content}, #{ageTarget} )
mapper.select: SELECT V.IDX, V.USER_IDX, V.VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX, VT.NAME AS VOLUNTEER_TYPE_NAME, V.VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX, VS.NAME AS VOLUNTEER_STATUS_NAME, V.TITLE, V.VOLUNTEER_DATE, V.TIME, V.LOCATION, V.CAPACITY, V.APPLICANTS, V.CONTENT, V.AGE_TARGET, V.CREATED_AT FROM VOLUNTEERS V JOIN VOLUNTEER_TYPES VT ON V.VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX = VT.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_STATUS VS ON V.VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX = VS.IDX WHERE V.IDX = #{volunteerIdx}
SELECT USER_IDX FROM VOLUNTEERS WHERE IDX = #{volunteerIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE VOLUNTEERS SET VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX = #{volunteerTypeIdx}, VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX = #{volunteerStatusIdx}, TITLE = #{title}, VOLUNTEER_DATE = #{volunteerDate}, TIME = #{time}, LOCATION = #{location}, CAPACITY = #{capacity}, CONTENT = #{content}, AGE_TARGET = #{ageTarget} WHERE IDX = #{volunteerIdx} AND USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOLUNTEERS WHERE IDX = #{volunteerIdx}

SELECT VR.IDX, VR.VOLUNTEER_IDX, VR.USER_IDX, VR.VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX, VRS.NAME AS VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_NAME, VR.TYPE, VR.NAME, VR.EMAIL, VR.TEL, VR.BIRTH_DATE, IFNULL(VR.GROUP_NAME, '-') AS GROUP_NAME, IFNULL(VR.GROUP_TEL, '-') AS GROUP_TEL, IFNULL(VR.DESCRIPTION, '-') AS DESCRIPTION, VR.MALE, VR.FEMALE, VR.CREATED_AT FROM VOLUNTEER_REQUESTS VR JOIN VOLUNTEERS V ON VR.VOLUNTEER_IDX = V.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS VRS ON VR.VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX = VRS.IDX WHERE VR.VOLUNTEER_IDX = #{volunteerIdx} ORDER BY VR.CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}

SELECT VR.IDX, VR.VOLUNTEER_IDX, VR.USER_IDX, VR.VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX, VRS.NAME AS VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_NAME, VR.TYPE, VR.NAME, VR.EMAIL, VR.TEL, VR.BIRTH_DATE, IFNULL(VR.GROUP_NAME, '-') AS GROUP_NAME, IFNULL(VR.GROUP_TEL, '-') AS GROUP_TEL, IFNULL(VR.DESCRIPTION, '-') AS DESCRIPTION, VR.MALE, VR.FEMALE, VR.CREATED_AT FROM VOLUNTEER_REQUESTS VR JOIN VOLUNTEERS V ON VR.VOLUNTEER_IDX = V.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS VRS ON VR.VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX = VRS.IDX WHERE VR.IDX = #{applicationIdx};
SELECT IDX, MALE, FEMALE FROM VOLUNTEER_REQUESTS WHERE VOLUNTEER_IDX = #{volunteerIdx} AND VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX = 2;
SELECT CAPACITY FROM VOLUNTEERS WHERE IDX = #{volunteerIdx};
SELECT MALE, FEMALE FROM VOLUNTEER_REQUESTS WHERE IDX = #{applicationIdx} AND VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX IN (1, 2, 3)
mapper.update: UPDATE VOLUNTEER_REQUESTS SET VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX = 2 WHERE IDX = #{applicationIdx} AND VOLUNTEER_REQUEST_STATUS_IDX IN (1, 3)
